sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_75d5a911db3df30019565d50cf961967
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.OnboardingSetMessage</api_name><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>OnboardingSetMessage</name><script><![CDATA[var OnboardingSetMessage = Class.create();
OnboardingSetMessage.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	setMessage : function(){
		var req_item_sys_id=this.getParameter('sysparm_req_item_id');
		var groupName = this.getParameter('sysparm_groupName');
		var requestedAction = this.getParameter('sysparm_requestedAction');
		var groupMembers = this.getParameter('sysparm_groupMembers');
		gs.log('requestedAction : '+requestedAction);
		var groupMembersBack=(function(){
			var gr=new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember');
			gr.addNotNullQuery('group');
			gr.addQuery('group',groupName);
			gr.query();
			var user=[];
			while(gr.next()){
				user.push(gr.user.toString());
			}
			return user;
		})();

		var removeMemberName1= (function (groupMembers,groupMembersBack){
			var removeMember=groupMembersBack.toString().split(',').filter(function(userId){
				return (groupMembers.indexOf(userId)==-1);});
			var removeMembersName=_getNamesFromSysID(removeMember);
			return removeMembersName;

		})(groupMembers,groupMembersBack);
		gs.log('removeMemberName1 : '+ removeMemberName1);

		var addMemberName1= (function (groupMembers,groupMembersBack){
			gs.log( 'groupMembers : '+ groupMembers);
			gs.log( 'groupMembersBack : '+ groupMembersBack);
			var addedmembers=groupMembers.toString().split(',').filter(function(userId){
				if(groupMembersBack.toString().indexOf(userId)==-1){
					gs.log('userId : '+userId);
					return true;
				}
			});
			var addMembersName=_getNamesFromSysID(addedmembers);
			return addMembersName;

		})(groupMembers,groupMembersBack);

		function _getNamesFromSysID(userSysId){
			var namesArray=[];
			var  userName=new GlideRecord('sys_user');
			userName.addQuery('sys_id','IN',userSysId);
			userName.query();
			while (userName.next()){
				namesArray.push(userName.name.toString());
			}
			return namesArray;
		}

		gs.log('addMemberName1 : '+ addMemberName1);

		var message='';
		var req_action_msg='';

		if(requestedAction.indexOf('New')!=-1){
			req_action_msg=requestedAction.substring(requestedAction.indexOf('New')-1);
		}

		

		if (addMemberName1.length==0 && removeMemberName1.length==0)
			message=req_action_msg;
		else if (addMemberName1.length==0 && removeMemberName1.length>0 )
			message= gs.getMessage('Members to remove : {0} {1}\n', [removeMemberName1.join(),req_action_msg]);
		else if (removeMemberName1.length==0 &&addMemberName1.length>0 )
			message= gs.getMessage('Members to add : {0} {1}\n', [addMemberName1.join(),req_action_msg]);
		else
			message= gs.getMessage('Members to Add : {0} \nMembers to remove : {1} {2}\n', [addMemberName1.join(),removeMemberName1.join(),req_action_msg]);

		return message;
	},



	type: 'OnboardingSetMessage'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>RV</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-06-01 19:21:08</sys_created_on><sys_id>75d5a911db3df30019565d50cf961967</sys_id><sys_mod_count>84</sys_mod_count><sys_name>OnboardingSetMessage</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_75d5a911db3df30019565d50cf961967</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>RV</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-06-07 06:08:49</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_2af8b44cdb21b30019565d50cf961904
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sys_user</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Notify user</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	var date =new GlideDateTime();
	date.addDays(-1);

	var user=new GlideRecord('sys_user');
	user.addQuery('last_login_time','<=',date);
	while (user.next()){
		gs.eventQueue('notify user ',user,user.user_id);
	}
	// Add your code here
	//gs.addInfoMessage('user record updated');
	


})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>RV</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-05-16 08:33:42</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>2af8b44cdb21b30019565d50cf961904</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Notify user</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_2af8b44cdb21b30019565d50cf961904</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>RV</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-05-16 19:31:47</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=2af8b44cdb21b30019565d50cf961904"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>false</active><api_name>global.SR_ChangeRequestAjaxUtils</api_name><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
	if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
		return;
	}

	var groupAjax = new GlideAjax('SR_ChangeRequestAjaxUtils');
	groupAjax.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getRequestedAction');
	groupAjax.addParam('sysparm_groupName', g_form.getValue('var_group_name'));
	groupAjax.addParam('sysparm_groupMembersVariable', newValue.toString().split(','));
	groupAjax.addParam('sysparm_groupManager', g_form.getValue('var_current_manager'));
	groupAjax.getXML(setRequestedAction);

	function setRequestedAction(response) {
		var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
		g_form.setValue('requested_action',answer);

	}	
}</description><name>SR_ChangeRequestAjaxUtils</name><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Utility class for change request client side calls
 * 
 * @class 
 * @author Harish Murikinati [S02W42]
 * @extends global.module:sys_script_include.AbstractAjaxProcessor
 * @memberof global.module:sys_script_include
 */
var SR_ChangeRequestAjaxUtils = Class.create();
SR_ChangeRequestAjaxUtils.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, /** @lends global.module:sys_script_include.SR_ChangeRequestAjaxUtils.prototype */ {

	/**
	 * Get the assignment group based on the configuration id selected on the change request
	 * 
	 * @returns {undefined} Sys ID of Assignment Group Name
	 */
	getAssignmentGroup: function () {

		var ciAssignmentGroup = new GlideRecord("cmdb_ci");
		ciAssignmentGroup.addQuery("sys_id", this.getParameter("sysparm_configuration_item_sysID"));
		ciAssignmentGroup.query();
		if (ciAssignmentGroup.next()) {
			return ciAssignmentGroup.getValue("assignment_group");
		} else {
			return "";
		}
	},

	/**
	 * Validate planned start date is future date
	 * 
	 * @returns {String} numeric value of date diff
	 */
	isValidStartDate: function () {

		var startdate = new GlideDateTime();
		startdate.setDisplayValue(this.getParameter('sysparm_plannedStartDate'));

		var currentdate = new GlideDateTime();
		currentdate.setDisplayValue(gs.nowDateTime());

		var sdateinseconds = parseInt(startdate.getNumericValue()) / 1000;
		var cdateinseconds = parseInt(currentdate.getNumericValue()) / 1000;
		return (parseInt(sdateinseconds) - parseInt(cdateinseconds)) < 0;
	},

	/**
	 * Get all groups which user is member of or manger of the group
	 * 
	 * @returns {String} Sysid of the groups
	 */
	getMyGroups: function () {
		var currentUserSysid = gs.getUserID();
		var allMyGroups = [];
		var userGroupRecord = new GlideRecord("sys_user_group");
		userGroupRecord.addQuery("manager", currentUserSysid);
		userGroupRecord.query();
		while (userGroupRecord.next()) {
			allMyGroups.push(userGroupRecord.getValue("sys_id"));
		}

		var groupMember = new GlideRecord("sys_user_grmember");
		groupMember.addQuery("user", currentUserSysid);
		groupMember.query();
		while (groupMember.next()) {

			allMyGroups.push(groupMember.getValue("group"));

		}
		return allMyGroups.toString();
	},

	/**
	 * Get group manager and members based on the Group name selected on catalog item
	 * 
	 * @param {String} sysparm_group Sys Id of the group
	 * @returns {String} JSON string with Group members and group manager
	 */
	getGroupDetails: function () {

		var answer={}; 
		var groupName = this.getParameter("sysparm_group");
		answer.groupMembers = this._getGroupMembers(groupName);
		answer.groupManager = this._getGroupManager(groupName);
		return  JSON.stringify(answer);
	},
	/**
	 * Get all the group members
	 * 
	 * @param {String} groupSysId Sys Id of the group
	 * @returns {String} Comma separated sys ids of members of group
	 */
	_getGroupMembers: function(groupSysId){
		var users = [];
		var grGroupMembers = new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember');
		grGroupMembers.addQuery('group', groupSysId);
		grGroupMembers.addNotNullQuery('group');
		grGroupMembers.query();
		while (grGroupMembers.next()) {
			users.push(grGroupMembers.getValue('user'));
		}
		return users.toString();
	},
	/**
	 * Get group manager
	 * 
	 * @param {String} groupSysId Sys ID of the group
	 * @returns {String} Sys ID of the Manager
	 */
	_getGroupManager: function(groupSysId){
		if (gs.nil(groupSysId)) {
			return '';
		}
		var grManager = new GlideRecord('sys_user_group');
		grManager.addQuery('sys_id',groupSysId);
		grManager.addNotNullQuery('manager');
		grManager.query();
		if (grManager.next()){
			return grManager.getValue('manager');
		} else {
			return '';
		}
	},

	getRequestedAction: function(){
		var groupName = this.getParameter("sysparm_groupName");
		var groupMembersVariable = this.getParameter("sysparm_groupMembersVariable");
		var groupManager = this.getParameter("sysparm_groupManager");


		var groupMembersDatabase = (function (groupName, groupManager){
			var groupMember = new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember');
			groupMember.addNotNullQuery('group');
			groupMember.addQuery('group', groupName);
			groupMember.addQuery('user', '!=', groupManager);
			groupMember.query();
			var user= [];
			while(groupMember.next()){
				user.push(groupMember.user.toString());
			}
			return user;
		})(groupName, groupManager);

		var removeMember = groupMembersDatabase.toString().split(',').filter(function(userId){
			return (groupMembersVariable.indexOf(userId)==-1);
		});
		var grRemoveMember = this._getUserName(removeMember);

		var addedmembers = groupMembersVariable.toString().split(',').filter(function(userId){
			return (groupMembersDatabase.indexOf(userId)==-1);
		});
		var grAddMember = this._getUserName(addedmembers);
		gs.log('addedmembers: ' + addedmembers);
		gs.log('removeMember: ' + removeMember);

		var message = gs.getMessage('Members to Add : {0} and Members to remove : {1}', [grAddMember.join(),grRemoveMember.join()]);
		return message;
	},

	_getUserName: function(userSysId){
		var namesArray = [];
		var  grUserName = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
		grUserName.addQuery('sys_id','IN', userSysId);
		grUserName.query();
		while (grUserName.next()){
			namesArray.push(grUserName.name.toString());
		}
		return namesArray;
	},
	type: 'SR_ChangeRequestAjaxUtils'
});

]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>AG</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-06-03 18:36:18</sys_created_on><sys_id>fe10ffbddbf5770019565d50cf9619d2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SR_ChangeRequestAjaxUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_fe10ffbddbf5770019565d50cf9619d2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>RV</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-06-04 09:28:04</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_1936282edbfdb70019565d50cf9619c2
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Onboarding">194b7f2ddb09370019565d50cf9619db</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:7871d8bddb49370019565d50cf961955</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>requestNewManager Msg</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
	if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
		return;
	}

	var reqActionMsg='';
	if(g_form.getValue('request_new_manager')=='true'){
		reqActionMsg=g_form.getValue('requested_action');
		//alert(reqActionMsg.indexOf('New'));
		if(reqActionMsg.indexOf('New')!=-1){
			reqActionMsg=reqActionMsg.substring(0,(reqActionMsg.indexOf('New')-1));
			//alert(reqActionMsg);
		}
		var requestManagwerName='';
		g_form.getReference('new_manager',function (ref){
			reqActionMsg+='\nNew manager Requested is : '+ref.getValue('name');
			g_form.setValue('requested_action',reqActionMsg);
		});
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>RV</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-06-05 11:52:12</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>1936282edbfdb70019565d50cf9619c2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>35</sys_mod_count><sys_name>requestNewManager Msg</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_1936282edbfdb70019565d50cf9619c2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>RV</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-06-07 09:34:12</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

remote_update_set.display_value: Notify user if not logged infor 2 days

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_c3c72191db3df30019565d50cf9619bc
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Onboarding">194b7f2ddb09370019565d50cf9619db</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:42cc33addb09370019565d50cf9619b4</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>setRequestedAction</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
	if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
		return;
	}
		
	var ga = new GlideAjax('OnboardingSetMessage'); 
	ga.addParam('sysparm_name','setMessage');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_groupName',g_form.getValue('group'));
	ga.addParam('sysparm_requestedAction',g_form.getValue('requested_action'));
	ga.addParam('sysparm_groupMembers',newValue.toString().split(','));
	ga.getXML(getMessage);
	function getMessage(response) {
		var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
		//alert(answer);
		g_form.setValue('requested_action',answer);
	}
	

}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>RV</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-06-01 19:35:33</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>c3c72191db3df30019565d50cf9619bc</sys_id><sys_mod_count>18</sys_mod_count><sys_name>setRequestedAction</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_c3c72191db3df30019565d50cf9619bc</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>RV</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-06-05 19:03:18</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Onboarding">194b7f2ddb09370019565d50cf9619db</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:42cc33addb09370019565d50cf9619b4</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>setRequestedAction_Amit</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
	if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
		return;
	}

	var groupAjax = new GlideAjax('SR_ChangeRequestAjaxUtils');
	groupAjax.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getRequestedAction');
	groupAjax.addParam('sysparm_groupName', g_form.getValue('var_group_name'));
	groupAjax.addParam('sysparm_groupMembersVariable', newValue.toString().split(','));
	groupAjax.addParam('sysparm_groupManager', g_form.getValue('var_current_manager'));
	groupAjax.getXML(setRequestedAction);

	function setRequestedAction(response) {
		var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
		g_form.setValue('requested_action',answer);

	}	
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>RV</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-06-03 18:44:01</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>29c17731db39770019565d50cf96195c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>setRequestedAction_Amit</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_29c17731db39770019565d50cf96195c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>RV</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-06-04 04:40:35</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
